function.name: getComment
function.description: Returns the cookie comment.
function.summary: Returns the cookie comment.
function.sample: var cookie = client.getCookie('cookieName') var path = cookie.getComment();

function.name: getDomain
function.description: Returns the cookie domain.
function.summary: Returns the cookie domain.
function.sample: var cookie = client.getCookie('cookieName') var domain = cookie.getDomain();

function.name: getName
function.description: Returns the cookie name.
function.summary: Returns the cookie name.
function.sample: var cookie = client.getCookie('cookieName') var name = cookie.getName();

function.name: getPath
function.description: Returns the cookie path.
function.summary: Returns the cookie path.
function.sample: var cookie = client.getCookie('cookieName') var path = cookie.getPath();

function.name: getSecure
function.description: Returns the cookie secure attribute.
function.summary: Returns the cookie secure attribute.
function.sample: var cookie = client.getCookie('cookieName') var path = cookie.getSecure();

function.name: getValue
function.description: Returns the cookie value.
function.summary: Returns the cookie value.
function.sample: var cookie = client.getCookie('cookieName') var value = cookie.getValue();

function.name: createDeleteRequest
function.description: Creates a new delete request (a request to delete a resource on server).
function.summary: Creates a new delete request (a request to delete a resource on server).

function.name: createGetRequest
function.description: Creates a new get request (retrieves whatever information is stored on specified url).
function.summary: Creates a new get request (retrieves whatever information is stored on specified url).

function.name: createHeadRequest
function.description: Creates a new head request (similar to get request, must not contain body content).
function.summary: Creates a new head request (similar to get request, must not contain body content).

function.name: createOptionsRequest
function.description: Creates a new options request (a request for information about communication options).
function.summary: Creates a new options request (a request for information about communication options).

function.name: createPostRequest
function.description: Create a new post request ( Origin server should accept/process the submitted data.)
function.summary: Create a new post request ( Origin server should accept/process the submitted data.

function.name: createPutRequest
function.description: Creates a new put request (similar to post request, contains information to be submitted).
function.summary: Creates a new put request (similar to post request, contains information to be submitted).

function.name: createTraceRequest
function.description: Creates a new trace request (debug request, server will just echo back).
function.summary: Creates a new trace request (debug request, server will just echo back).

function.name: getCookie
function.description: Get a cookie by name.
function.summary: Get a cookie by name.

function.name: getCookies
function.description: Get all cookies from this client.
function.summary: Get all cookies from this client.

function.description: Set proxy credentials.

function.description: Sets a timeout in milliseconds for retrieving of data (when 0 there is no timeout).
function.summary: Sets a timeout in milliseconds for retrieving of data (when 0 there is no timeout).

function.name: getCharset
function.description: Get the charset of the response body.
function.summary: Get the charset of the response body.

function.name: getMediaData
function.description: Get the content of response as binary data. It also supports gzip-ed content.
function.summary: Get the content of response as binary data.

function.name: getResponseBody
function.description: Get the content of the response as String.
function.summary: Get the content of the response as String.

function.name: getResponseHeaders
function.description: Gets the headers of the response as name/value arrays.
function.summary: Gets the headers of the response as name/value arrays.

function.name: getResponseHeaders
function.description: Gets the headers of the response as name/value arrays.
function.summary: Gets the headers of the response as name/value arrays.

function.name: getStatusCode
function.description: Gets the status code of the response, the list of the possible values is in HTTP_STATUS constants.
function.summary: Gets the status code of the response, the list of the possible values is in HTTP_STATUS constants.
function.sample: var status = response.getStatusCode();// compare with HTTP_STATUS constants

function.name: createHttpClient
function.description: Get or create an http client.
function.summary: Get or create an http client.

function.name: createNewHttpClient
function.description: Create an http client (like a web browser with session binding) usable todo multiple request/posts in same server session.
function.summary: Create an http client (like a web browser with session binding) usable todo multiple request/posts in same server session.

function.name: deleteHttpClient
function.description: Delete a named http client.
function.summary: Delete a named http client.
function.deprecated: Obsolete method, HttpClient mechanism has changed.

function.name: getHttpClientCookie
function.description: Get cookie object from the specified client.
function.summary: Get cookie object from the specified client.

function.name: getHttpClientCookies
function.description: Returns a Cookie array with all the cookies set on the specified client.
function.summary: Returns a Cookie array with all the cookies set on the specified client.

function.name: getLastPageCharset
function.description: Get the charset of the last page received with getPageData(...)
function.summary: Get the charset of the last page received with getPageData(.

function.name: getMediaData
function.description: Get media (binary data) such as images in a variable. It also supports gzip-ed content.
function.summary: Get media (binary data) such as images in a variable.

function.name: getMediaData
function.description: Get media (binary data) such as images in a variable. It also supports gzip-ed content.
function.summary: Get media (binary data) such as images in a variable.

function.name: getPageData
function.description: Get all page html in a variable
function.summary: Get all page html in a variable
function.sample: // get data using a default connection var pageData = plugins.http.getPageData('http://www.cnn.com');

function.name: getPageData
function.description: Get all page html in a variable (authentication only works with http client usage). A http client will be created/used.
function.summary: Get all page html in a variable (authentication only works with http client usage).
function.sample: // create an http client and use it to get the data var pageData = plugins.http.getPageData('http://www.cnn.com','myclient');

function.name: getPageData
function.description: Get all page html in a variable (authentication only works with http client usage). If name is provided a http client will be created/used.
function.summary: Get all page html in a variable (authentication only works with http client usage).
function.sample: // create an http client and use it to get the data var pageData = plugins.http.getPageData('http://www.admin.com','myclient','myuser','secret');

function.name: getPoster
function.description: Get poster object to do http (file) posts. If posting files, it will post multipart!
function.summary: Get poster object to do http (file) posts.

function.name: put
function.description: Put a file at the specified URL.
function.summary: Put a file at the specified URL.

function.name: put
function.description: Put a file at the specified URL, using authentication.
function.summary: Put a file at the specified URL, using authentication.

function.name: setClientProxyCredentials
function.description: Set the proxy username and password. Used for named http clients (else use implicit java data).
function.summary: Set the proxy username and password.

function.name: setClientProxyUserNamePassword
function.description: Set the proxy username and password. Used for named http clients (else use implicit java data).
function.summary: Set the proxy username and password.

function.name: setHttpClientCookie
function.description: Add cookie to the specified client.
function.summary: Add cookie to the specified client.

function.name: setTimeout
function.description: Sets a timeout in milliseconds for retrieving of data (when 0 there is no timeout).
function.summary: Sets a timeout in milliseconds for retrieving of data (when 0 there is no timeout).
